alert.note: Alert for Boulder; Jefferson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:54PM MDT until June 21 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Jefferson County in central Colorado... Southeastern Boulder County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 553 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eldorado Springs, or 23 miles northwest of Denver, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rocky Flats, Eldorado Springs, Boulder, southwestern Broomfield, Lafayette, Louisville and Superior. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
